page.title: 19A Hall Green Inhabitant.cont
page.content: When I was at school there were no school dinners or school uniform but my mam always made my wear a tunic and blouse. I left school when I was fifteen and got a job at duck fleet mill working cotton. I didnt Like my first job but i was really lucky to get it. I had a big family with two sisters, one brother ang goodness knows how many pets. My mother was a typical animal lover an we had our own goats and chickens, two dogs called Tiboy and Jangle, a cat called mermaid, a Guinea pig called Hariet and my brothers pride and joy was a mangy looking Hegehog called tulip. I can remember when there was no Radio or Television and one of my sons sent away for a kit and he built a Radio himself. If there was anything I could change in my whole life I dont think I would. I've had a good life.
